enum.msg: Testing my new build y'all. LEAVE ME FOOD.

enum.title: Help me!
enum.body: Egor stole my pants. Please get them back!

enum.title: Target: Jellygirl
enum.body: Jellygirl is annoying. Let's kill her ...

enum.title: For the good of the garden
enum.body: Eels are eating my cabbage. Follow them before it's too late.

enum.title: A lost cause
enum.body: My friend keeps making bad jokes. Could you teach him to be funny?

enum.title: Greedy Minions
enum.body: I'm poor. Could you convince Boss Lady to give me a raise?

enum.title: TO ARMS!!!
enum.body: Let's play pictionary. If you win, I'll give you something nice.

enum.title: Hungry games
enum.body: Bring me 5 raccoons and 10 cabbage patch kids
